mapper.select: SELECT replyId, replyText, replyer, R.regDate, nickname FROM REPLY_TB R, USER_TB U WHERE boardId = #{boardId} AND R.replyer = U.userId ORDER BY replyId DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO REPLY_TB (boardId, REPLYTEXT, REPLYER) VALUES (#{boardId}, #{replytext}, #{replyer})
mapper.update: UPDATE REPLY_TB SET REPLYTEXT = #{replytext}, regDATE = now() WHERE replyId = #{replyId}
